title: Nice little calm place with beautiful view of the valley
review: Nice place. Small but calm and clean. The temple is nicely maintained. I think, it is also called as Buddha temple. It has a beautiful view of the valley. It must be even more beautiful in the monsoon with the clouds and rain.

title: Quiet and Serene
review: A very nice place to visit in Mussorie. It is located at the end of the compound after the Tibetan school.

title: Sameeksha By Sachin - A Beautiful Buddhist Temple at Serene Place
review: Shedup Choepelling Temple popularly known as Buddha Temple is the place of worship for Tibetan Buddhist. This place is approximately 3 kilometers from Library Chowk, Massoorie and situated at Happy Valley. His Holiness Dalai Lama took refuge here initially. The temple is comparatively smaller but very beautiful. When you enter the temple you tend to go towards right but you have to go straight and revolve 45 Kal Chakras (Prayer Wheels). You can also see a tree planted by His Holiness Dalai Lama. There is a  beautiful idol of Lord Buddha and a painting of H.H. Dalai Lama inside the main temple. There is a Stupa and another small temple inside the temple complex.You can see a beautiful view of valley from the temple complex. This is a must visit place, highly recommended.

title: dalai lama temple of mussoorie
review: This temple gives the most peaceful and religious surrounding in whole of mussoorie. People can really spend longs hours sitting and admiring the beauty of mussoorie. The travellers would love the views of the himalayan range from this temple . Overal the monks here tell the history behind the temple . The monastry allows the travellers to take pictures as at some places it not allowed. I went there solo but made 4-5 friends when i left after 2 hours. The monks are very friendly and polite in nature. We can do prayers from outiside the temple also by sitting on the ground ..

title: Nice place for a visit
review: One of the good places to visit around Mussoorie. Calm and serene. Colourful and Tibetan. Can spend much time here sitting and doing nothing else.

title: nothing to view.
review: Its a waste of time as i was not even sure when i reached as to why did i even come as there was nothing to view at all except under repair buildings only.

title: Not that good
review: We walked to this location as well from our gun hill resort, club mahindra. It is not in good shape.

title: Peaceful Place with Stunning View
review: I have been there many more time, this is the one of the best place to see in Mussoorie. Located just 2-3 Kms from Mussoorie Mall Road and nearby LBSNAA. As usual the monastery always a great place where we can spend our peaceful time but this monastery is really amazing. I would like to say every traveler who's the peace & quietness lover you must go there once while you plan to visit mussoorie.

title: nice peaceful place for meditation and great valley view
review: this temple is very clam and have very positive feel. there is a school where we saw those lovely kids studying in warm winter sun. nice place to be there.

title: Serene & Calm
review: It is completely a Buddhist monarchy where we can have a glimpse of their spiritual experience.

title: Beautiful small temple... worth visiting
review: It's a small but beautiful temple with huge prayer wheel in a separate room next to the main building. You can also enjoy beautiful panoramic views from the temple premises.

title: Peaceful sanctuary
review: Perfect place for people seeking solace from the otherwise noisy and bustling town of Mussorie. The views from the valley are picturesque and tend to soothe you. The monastery is soothing to the nerves and built in a typical Buddhist architectural fashion with high beams and a beautiful sloping grand entrance.

title: Lost Experience
review: Unfortunately we had a vague experience here.

title: Buddha Temple.
review: Located near the Tibetan School and about two kilometres from the Lal Bahadur Shastri National Academy of Administration,this is a small temple of Lord Buddha from where you get an awesome view of the hills around. The place is peaceful and gives you positive vibes as you can have a quick stroll around the place.

title: Peaceful Sanctuary
review: It is a nice quiet place, combining the auras of a spiritual place and an educational center.   Tibetan settlements can be seen around.

title: Quaint and Peaceful
review: The Shedup Temple was one of my 2 favourite destinations in Mussoorie. It is located about 20mins from the Library Chowk on the same route which takes you to Company Garden.

title: Gorgeous temple
review: It's a quiet place, perfect for meditation. The devotees paint the temple themselves and it's a great experince seeing how much they love their god.

title: Peace ☮️
review: A peaceful a serene environment away for huatlw and bustle of the mall. Don't forget to visit the buddha statue at the hill top on the side of the temple.

title: Mind of Peace
review: This is a peaceful temple with heritage Buddhist architect. It is located near IAS Academy. Spend an hour enjoying the peace and natural beauty.

title: Peaceful
review: This is the best place in Mussorie. The temple is extremely peaceful & the view is beautiful  Must visit.

title: Not so popular but good place
review: This temple is in the midst tibbetian Society. When you will reach there you will find the surroundings are like tibbetian. It's not that much popular so it's less crowded. I were the temple is good and offers a good few also. It's a peaceful place and need to be visit once.

title: Beautiful Temple
review: Shedup Choepelling temple is also known as Tibetan Buddhist temple and is one of the famous Tibetan temples located in the destination.Housing many Tibetan literature and books,the temple is beautifully adorned by Clay lamps in the lamp house and the prayer flags.

title: A Very Special Space in a Happy Valley
review: A mall temple uniquely located facing  the western mountains.  You turn left on entering the temple grounds and are thereby invited to rotate the assembly of Prayer Wheels.  I was so lucky on exiting this section to hear the older monks begin chanting. We went around to the front, off footwear and entered inside.   Wow what a spey gift.   The views around the temple including of course the Valley s below was worth the visit alone. Looking North you can see the 100 ' s of Prayer Flags.

title: Tranquil hidden gem just 2-3 Kms away from Library Chowk at Happy Valley
review: Usually not on the list of Must-See spots in Mussoorie, but this tranquil hidden gem located just 2-3 Kms away from the Mussoorie town (Library Chowk) can be reached by Taxi ( Rs 250 for round trip) needs to be visited while in Mussoorie. Typical Tibetan Buddhist temple with colorful prayer flags, prayer wheels, monks meditating & chanting, Golden idols of Lord Buddha & Dalai Lama. Mesmerizing views of the mountains all around are an added treat.  Feels really serene .

title: good and peaceful
review: hidden gem of mussoorie. it was not our list of mussoorie trip but we visited. and it was great. away from crowd. everyone should visit who like buddha

title: Peaceful & Quiet
review: Although its a km off the main road, its close enough to Liabrary Chowk. Its peaceful & secluded. Not many visitors. Clean & well maintained. Do drop a note in the donation box which to to your left as you enter.

title: Experience a Tibetan monastery up-close
review: Calm, peaceful place away from the hustle and bustle of Mall road where you can experience nature at its best in a Tibetan Monastery. Shedup Choephelling Temple is a road less travelled.

title: Serene peaceful and beautiful
review: This temple gives you peace of mind and soul. Calm and serene place also giving you the amazing views of mussoorie valley. If you really want to spend time all by yourself this place is a must visit. Sunset is beautiful from here. Would live to visit again.

title: Must go place
review: Temple gives you insight into Tibetan culture. Locate in a scenic environment, one feels relaxed on visiting the place and it has open place for a good sunbath. Overall we enjoyed visiting the place.

title: Peaceful Buddhist temple
review: We visited this temple along with Kempty falls package. Nice and peaceful temple with lots of flowers. Decorated shrine of Buddha inside the temple.

title: Serene Buddhist temple
review: Shedup Choepelling temple is a peaceful Tibetean Buddhist monastery in Mussoorie.

title: Peaceful
review: This temple is situated little far from city.  it is a very peaceful place. and for a change it is not crowded at all.

title: Peace....
review: Extremely clean..beautifull place. The temple that the dalai lama frist settled in before moving to dalhousie. Beautifull view....

title: Serene Shedup!
review: It's a simple , peaceful Buddhist Temple. I loved the view from the temple. It's clean and there is not much embargo on photography . It is situated in Happy valley. We passed the Tibetan School while approaching this temple.

title: Peaceful place
review: Very very very peaceful place... very neat and clean... one can sit for hours without any distraction.... excellent view of nature... nice place to take photographs..... thanks to Lord Buddha ji and Dalai Lama ji....

title: Peaceful and scenic!!
review: Shedup Choepelling Temple was the highlight of my trip. It is extremely peaceful and offers a spectacular view of the valley. One can sit there for hours and immerse oneself amidst nature and the mighty power above us all!!

title: wonderful temple
review: it is not much famous place but worth to visit. it is on happy valley and you can see doon valley from here. amazing view.

title: Wonderful Tibetan Temple
review: The shedup temple is located at Happy Valley near LBSNAA i.e. IAS Academy. Its a beautiful place with amazing view of Doon Valley. One must visit place whenever you are in Mussoorie. Inside you can find peace and calmness. Its open for everyone hence one must experience this beautiful temple.

title: Best of mussorie
review: In a place like mussorie, where their is nothing much to see, one can totally come here to have a good views. It is a small temple, located in happy valley, peaceful, away from crowds.

title: Buddha Temple
review: A good feel of Buddha temple. Not too far. Driveable with last 200 mts walking. Mini uphil downhill. Excellent view.

title: Peaceful
review: This holy place was so peaceful. We remained there for a while and soaked in the Blessings and the views.

title: A Space Between Two Thoughts
review: What a wonderful way to start a visit to Happy Valley.  The temple is located in an area sometimes known as 'Little Tibet' as it was here that the Dali Lama first came when he fled Tibet.  This beautiful piece oF Tibetan Architecture sits with a stunning view of the mountain all about. As I walked towards the Temple the cool refreshing breeze which moves up the mountains side sends  a musical treble through the leaves of the tree.  What a refreshing and moving experience as one enters this space.  To the Left are the Prayer wheels where you might be encouraged to drop any 'picket fences' you surround yourself with, turn the wheels and recite the Om Mani Padme Hum as you move along. Nearby you will also find an avenue of prayer flags strung out along the peak of the mountain.  So. much to See, So Much received in just Being.

title: Tibetan Charm!
review: A small Buddhist Temple with serenity and quite around. Great place for meditation and taking pictures. Less crowded.

title: lovely atmosphere around the temple
review: situated on high mountains the temple gives you extremely positive vibes. small temple and not at all crowded. at least give it a chance

title: Beautiful Tibetean Buddhist temple
review: The Shedup Choepelling temple is a beautiful place of Buddhist worship.

title: Budist Temple not so crowed
review: I am no Buddhist but i make sure i visit a temple when ever possible just attracted by their customs. I like the deep silence and the serenity. the view from out side the temple is good and it is on the way to Happy Valley.

title: Buddhist temple
review: A quiet place and can be visited to see a Buddhist temple. Very easily accessible and peaceful location.

title: Peaceful location, away from the hustle bustle of Mussoorie
review: Not many tourists flock to this temple situated in the Happy Valley area. When Dalai Lama fled Tibet, he established the Tibetan settlement here. This Buddhist temple is the most important building of the settlement. The view of the valley from the temple is awesome.

title: A peaceful abode :)
review: It was so beautiful, charming, pleasant and peaceful here. We sat there for quiet a long time. Just come to this place to relax and refresh. Peace will follow your mind! :)

title: Nice tibetian temple
review: Its one of the small tibetian temple at mussoorie .Thoe its small, its serane & view from out side the temple is beautiful,Whwnever a visit to mussoorie can try this also

title: Beautiful
review: A small beautiful monastery with beautiful view of hills. Can be included in sightseeing tour when you have visited Mussoorie.

title: Tibet in India
review: Dalai Lama when he first came to India lived here for first few years. The place  is peaceful.It is nice to walk around. There is a restaurant there but we did not visit there.

title: Good place to visit..quite and scenic beauty
review: Good place to visit, one monetary and scenic view of valley, can click few clicks. Not much crowded so you can spend some time over here.

title: Peace
review: My first visit to a Tibetan Temple. Its peaceful and Calm.  You also climb a little to the flag are. Its BEAUTIFUL out there. You can get great clicks and the view is amazing too.

title: Heaven in Mussoorie!!!
review: After disappointing sight seeing at Kempty Fall & Company Garden, we decided to visit this Buddha Temple.

title: Worth visiting while in Mussorie
review: This woukd be the best place out of all the places, I have visited while I was in Mussorie. The location and tranquil nature of make this place worth visiting. The view of the valley from the top is also awsome...

title: Nice Quiet Place
review: Nice Quiet Place. Has a great feel. Do not make noise and act ignorant and respect the place, avoid taking outrageous photos in the premises.

title: Typical Tibetan Charm
review: Shedup Choepelling is a calm place not much frequented by travellers. I had my visit there during my Uttarakhand trip with my travel friends. The temple and the Tibetan settlement are having their beauty in typical Tibetan colours. We spent almost one hour there. Compared to other Tibetan settlements in Dehradun,  Kushalnagar (Karnataka) etc,  there is not much place to walk around here.  But the cold climate blended with the green view of the countryside makes it a must see place in Mussoorie.

title: Nice temple to visit
review: I liked the temple very much. Very peaceful place and outside the temple, very nice view of mountains. Do have time for this temple.

title: Long climb up!
review: This one is located very steep up the hills. Requires about 5-10 minutes of an exhausting climb.

title: beautiful place ... mst visit
review: absolutely stunning views .. the calmness you'd associate with any religious place ... great place to spend a lot of time

title: Peaceful and Nice
review: This was one of the few okay pl;aces to visit. A small buddhist temple. Well maintained and clean. They allow you to go inside and take pictures and donate at your free will

title: Divine Atmosphere
review: The Temple is situated near IAS Academy and surrounded by snow capped mountains. Very calm and beautiful place to visit. Those who are seeking peace must visit the place.

title: Nice buddhist temple with a grand view
review: It is a quiet and calm place overlooking the Happy Valley with hills all around. Nice place to go to in the evening. The Buddhist Temple will make for some colorful photographs.

title: Buddhist Temple worth a visit
review: great place to sit and meditate and great views from there ...it is about a 40/45 minute drive from the JW Marriot hotel

title: Peaceful
review: Really nice and beautiful temple and absolutely peaceful .. Very near to the IAS temple . The views are also breathtaking

title: Buddist temple
review: Place is very clam and relaxing. Valley & mountain opposite temple is awesome. Visit here to know more about Buddhist temple

title: Scenic peaceful place
review: Shedup Choepelling Temple locally known as Buddhist temple is divine and peaceful place to visit in Mussoorie. The temple is located on a cliff and provides an amazing panoramic view of the Mussoorie city.

title: Interesting Insight into Tibetian Culture
review: Ask lots of questions when you enter the temple. The locals are quite happy answering them. What is that chimney with smoke coming out of it? What is om-ma-ne-pad-me-hum? Why the prayer flags? Why the prayer wheels? Why the big prayer wheel? Why light the butter lamps? Why do people walk outside the prayer flag poles? Interesting walk around the temple. Spotlessly clean and everyone smiles.

title: Buddhist Monastery -- calm place
review: Nice calm place, little off road. Can be accessible only by personal transport.  There are prayer wheels. You will get beautiful view of mountains. You can donate as per your will. The Buddhist monk was nice & we clicked few pictures with him. There was a cute pet dog who is always with Monk.

title: an average place
review: the place is about 3 kms. from mall road and accessible through taxi/car where an expert driver is required.place is average .

title: Nice setting, serene and peaceful place
review: Small but compact temple.

title: A serene and tranquil place of devotion!
review: It's near to the Company garden, however, walking from Company garden to the temple would have taken may be around half an hour, so we preferred a taxi, as it was getting late in the evening. That way, we reached there in about 5 minutes from Company garden. It is located downhill and the place is called Happy valley. On the way there is the LBS IAS academy. The view of mountains from the temple campus is great. The temple is colorful and looked vibrant, just like any other monastery. There were hardly any tourists there and hence it was very calm and peaceful. One can spend up to an hour there. The view of monastery residences is also quite striking.

title: Best place filled with peace
review: If one is on vacations to be away from the chaotic and confused daily life and wants some peace, this is one of the best place to visit as it is away from the main city of Mussoorie and also provides beautiful front view covered with dense forest. You can enjoy the Sunset with the monks chanting in the background. As Gautam Buddha said "The Way is not in the sky, the Way is in the heart" you will feel the same at this place.

title: Serene and peaceful
review: There is something about this place which cannot be described in words. What caught my eye was the statue of Lord Buddha with the Garuda above. One look at the eyes of the Lord and you are taken to a different world. If Lord permits would visit regularly.

title: Very nice & peaceful place.
review: Very nice place & also peaceful. Young generation should visit once as many Tibetan youngsters be there & learns their traditional worship. Nice view from temple

title: Serene
review: Had visited this temple in the evening. It's very clean n peaceful place. One should visit this place to spend some quality time. View of the hill is also very beautiful from here. This is in the way back from kempty fall to Mussorie if you have enjoyed the fall and want to sit n admire the scenic view of hill this is the best place.

title: meditation of whole body
review: Dalai lama was given this land when he visited india it is near IAS academy .road is very steep .you can be feel of self meditation.

title: Serene and personal place
review: A small Buddhist temple in calm place.  Nice valley view from temple compound.  Located at scenic view point. One can spend good evening time here

title: Loved it
review: Though its small but nice, clean and well kept monastery.its in happy valley. There is a Buddha statue on top of the hill. Would not recommend the statue visit for old and kids as one needs to climb a lot before reaching the top

title: Calm and cool place for relaxation and view
review: Never thought, I will every find a calm and beautiful place like this. You can see couple of places around like Company Garden and Wax Museum. Met one Monk here and wanted to learn about Monastery but was short of time, or else if possible, would love to stay for a day or so.

title: Calm and beautiful
review: It is a calm and beautiful Bodh temple situated at a beautiful location. The environment and views around are very beautiful and enjoyable.

title: Beauty and Peace
review: The monastery was closed when we reached there (they close sometime around 12 in the afternoon) so we were not able to look inside. From the outside the place looks great. Its not very big in terms of size but the quite and calm surrounding makes your day. There is a balcony next to the monastery that provides mesmerising views of the surrounding mountains.

title: Well maintained tibetan temple
review: Very clean and well maintained.  We were told only 2 monks are at the temple. They were making butter sculptures in the temple. Not very crowded- in fact only two of us.  Nice long walk from town- only go if you have a lot of time.

title: Tibetian heritage
review: This is small Buddhist temple. I have been to other buddhist monasteries in manali and darjeeling. Comparitively this temple is much smaller and nothing in comparison to them.

title: Nice Place to visit
review: Holy place to visit with family. Enjoyable location. Nice View. Peaceful ambiance. Can not be visited multiple times. Good to visit one time.

title: Just another Monastery
review: After being to a few other bigger Monasteries, this one seemed a bit small and I was disappointed. But it has a viewing point with decent views.

title: Very Peaceful Monastery
review: We were lucky to reach the monastery before it closed in the noon. It's location is very scenic. It was very peaceful when we entered. Calm place to meditate.

title: Abode of peace
review: Never Experienced such an great silence of mind.

title: Must Visit
review: The monastery is small but offers breathtaking views. Must visit if you are in Mussoorie. Very well maintained.

title: Peaceful & Spiritual place
review: A calm & peaceful place to visit. Surrounded by nature. dense forest on surrounding mountains can be seen from the temple campus. Main temple of Lord Buddha quiet peaceful and lightened. Sunset view from here can also be awesome

title: Just being there is like merging with nature
review: Some crowded Mussoorie city lanes leads you to this Buddhist temple. This is very near to the IAS academy and other commercial establishments are there right upto the main gate. But once you walk past the gate of the temple, the scene is captivating. The small, simple temple stands at the top end of the hill overlooking a large depression of valley of dense forest. I just stood there to absorb the nature and its silence echoing from the adjoining mountains. When you are alone try to be there with the vast expansion of nature. When in group be in silence, because the beauty of the place is best observed in silence.

title: Nice place
review: Peaceful place. The temple is close to the Lal Bahadur Shastri Academy. Close to the temple is a hill that provides an amazing view of both, the valley and the temple itself . However, it is a really dangerous path for amateurs .

title: Most peaceful place in Mussourie
review: I had been there last month and I found like I was at the most peaceful and beautiful place. The way to the temple is very steep one has to be very careful in driving there in not much parking space so please see the parking space before entering the gate then its very difficult to turn back. After parking the vehicle the entrance to the temple is clean. In the temple the monk is there either meditating or writing his scripts you can sit for some time in the temple and then come out and see the beautiful mountains and the monestry the Buddhist people living near has their village. One can stay there in the monestry. It was awesome to visit.

title: Shanti.....
review: Amazing peace ...and  alluring view surrounding this temple......must visit and have a few minutes closed eye intro inspection..... and merge the soul with the fragrance of .....nature.....

title: Peaceful temple trek
review: Peaceful temple, that can be reached by walking down from IAS training academy. Went there in an expectation to find tibetian cuisine, but none available.

title: Peaceful and Scenic
review: I walked all the way from mall road to happy valley, and enjoyed every turn, road, and valley. It is a tranquil place where you can sit and spend some time with yourself.

title: Take the climb to the Buddha statue!!!
review: A little off the way but a peaceful place to visit away from the busier and more happening places in Mussoorie.

title: Oldest Tibetan settlement in india
review: This is the place where Tibetans first put their feet when they fled from Tibet with Dalai Lama. It's like a mini Tibet. This temple is built on the architecture which you find in all the monasteries either in Tibet or in eastern India. If you want peace from your hectic lifestyle then should be visited.

title: Shedup Choepelling Temple
review: This is one of the most beautiful temple in Mussoorie.  Worth visiting.  You will not regret visiting it.  Such a calm and peaceful place.

title: A small..serene..laidback monastery
review: Beautiful..laidback place.. very near the IAS academy..

title: Home to absolute tranquility
review: I always love going to the Buddhist temples. The Shedup Choepelling Temple too offers absolute peace. The monks with divinity on their faces roam in their orange robes. You can sit here for a while and lose yourself in the lap of nature.

title: Small trip
review: Beautiful view n a very quite place.....dont avoid this is one out of 5-6 good locations in mussoorie.

title: Lovely Tibetan temple
review: The temple was really nice and we felt very moved by the descriptions of what the Tibetans endured when the Chinese invaded. The Indian government gave them land in Mussoorie when they arrived with the Dalhi Lama.

title: Serene Place
review: Its a Tibetan monastery, and is very pleasant and silent . There are some monks with whom we interacted and was really pleased. they give u a overview of the temple if u want. Nearby there is a Tibetan school.

title: A wonderful experience
review: A beautiful experience - we were there when they were chanting and I found it a very rewarding memory.

title: Go for it
review: This is a must visit place on one's itinerary if you want some peace, tranquility and enjoy awesome views. Though requires some walking of half n hour from main road to the temple...

title: Beautiful Tibetan Temple
review: Clean, well maintained. Just before Company Bagh, a road goes down towards LBS Academy connects the temple

title: Nice Quiet place to reconnect with yourself
review: A nice Buddhist temple. One must sit there to enjoy the real place. A person like me can spend hours over there and enjoy the quietness.

title: A Beautiful Monastery
review: Shedup Choepeling Temple popularly called Budhdhist Temple by locals is abeautiful small temple in calm and serene surroundings..Once you are there you are awestuck by its calmness and divine peace.Meditate and have peace.Must visit if you are in Mussouri

title: calm and peaceful
review: small peaceful temple at a very pleasant place.not far from mall road , will have to take a cab.take a package cab for waterfall , company garden and temple

title: Quiet and peaceful
review: This is a budhhist temple located near IAS academy.the temple is very peaceful clean and located nicely.one can get average views of the valley.It is a simple,calm and clean place.one can visit if free in the mean time in mussoorie.

title: Quiet place
review: Must visit.

title: Serene Place
review: It is a small buddhist temple which is located at a peaceful corner..you can see clouds and mountains all around...it has a peaceful experience that you will feel the minute you get there..a place where you can go and meditate..

title: A wonderful place to visit
review: A very calm and peaceful place.  Even one can hear his inner voice also.  A must visit for nature lover and religious people.  Mesmerizing view from the temple adds charm to the place. Will remember it for a long time.

title: Nothing to see
review: Again i am telling there is nothing spl in mussoorie.the hill town might have been unpolluted and uncommercialised some 30years back.this is a very small temple.but you could see moving clouds infront in evening.

title: Silence and a view to match
review: It's part of most taxi tour packages operating in Mussoorie, so on the way to the LBS - IAS Academy, you come across a nook where amidst wild flowers and deep valleys, nestles this buddhist temple. The decorations are lovely and the feeling of complete solitude that envelops you while inside, is a great feeling, There is a lovely view as well from the promenade outside, and if you search for it, you will see a line of flags sending an ode to the heavens, reminding you to take a trip to the higher himalayas. A good place to spend a couple of hours of quiet time.

title: Nice buddhist temple
review: This place is quite beautiful the landscape in front of temple is very good also this place is known as buddha mandir by locals

title: Friendly place
review: I ended up there after a long walk from Mussoorie following a signal and asking people. At that time the temple was being restored (for the Dalai Lama's imminent visit) and also the monks were working at it. It's worth to visit it: it's not very big, but it's colorful and the surrounding area it's friendly. You can always meet someone smiling willing to talk with you.

title: A Tibetan Temple inaugurated by the Dalai Lama
review: You must ask the monks there to allow you and teach you to light the Butter Lamps to pray for all your loved departed ones whether they were humans,animals or plants! Don't forget to chant 'Om Mani Pad Me Om' while turning the prayer wheels.. The prayer basically forgives all spirits, good, bad and ugly!

title: Good view, nice flowers, lovely dog
review: We went there as part of our taxi package. the place is nice and humble. the view was very nice and there were some lovely flowers blooming. we arrived when the old (really old) monks were starting their prayer. it was nice to hear their chants. there is a small dog (like indian daschund) which was sitting among the monks and trying to eat some biscuits. it was a beautiful site that a human and animal is treated alike even inside a prayer room.

title: A Special Place
review: You're not quite all the way north in Mussoorie but this Buddhist Temple is a beautiful and kind reminder of what lies further up north, definitely worth a visit

title: A small Budhist Temple
review: A small Budhist temple about 12 kms from Mussoorie. Very attarctive paintings on the wall. Serene atmosphere

title: Buddhist temple.
review: One can feel the existence of a higher power  along with the heartwarming experience to visit this Buddhist temple. The view from this temple is very beautiful, specially the hills facing the temple..
